actual: The potential for voice-based interfaces in conversational AI applications is discussed, with a focus on voice-premised and wearable devices. The speakers emphasize the benefits of voice quality, including natural speech flow, and the potential for AI to be more human than humans in speech recognition. They also mention their involvement in machine learning and their plans to expand their waitlist for a speech-to-text model. They expect to release generally early next year, but if working on any real-time AI agent use cases, they can join their waitlist to jumpstart their development in production.
